Amanda M. Maples is Françoise Billion Richardson Curator of African Art at the New Orleans Museum of Art. She has taught university courses in African arts.
The New Orleans Museum of Art announced that it had hired Amanda M. Maples as its Françoise Billion Richardson Curator of African Art.
